title: Unfinished
content: A tool for education built with NextJS & PostgreSQL

title: https://predi.ct.it
content: A hastily created application that allows users to add predictions to my Ethereum smart contract. These predictions can be validated to show the timestamp of when they were created, proving that they were made before a given event.

title: Building Classification Project
content: I collected 5 million aerial images from various city GIS servers and programmatically sorted them into 8 categories using publicly available building use code data and then trained a convolutional neural network to recognize various building types using this aerial imagery. Peak accuracy was 89% after using focal loss to combat the overrepresentation of residential buildings in the sample. I eventually adapted this technology with a publically available segmentation model so that it could accept a single input image and classify all of the buildings automatically. This took some time but was a lot of fun upon completion.
